title: Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706: BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage.
OB: The current code includes the usage of Class.forName() in BidiUtil in win32.
EB: To resolve this issue, I suggest adding a private constructor to the BidiUtil class. Since there are no nonstatic methods in the class, this change would prevent unnecessary instantiation of the class and improve code clarity. Additionally, adding a private constructor does not increase the size of the compiled code.
SR:
Change the line above to: static Callback callback = new Callback(new BidiUtil().getClass(), "windowProc", 4);
Note: This change hasn't been tested, but it is expected to produce the same result.
